description:
One day at school, Nagi forgets her lunch. As her butler, Hayate is determined to deliver her lunch on time. While navigating the school grounds, he meets a couple of people, one who is friendly and one who wants to destroy him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: First Mission. This is Snake. No One`s Responding.
Hajimete no Otsukai. Kochira Snake. Daremo Outoushinai.
はぢめてのおつかい~こちらスネーク. 誰も応答しない
